backend/main.mo: Actor includes blob storage mixin for handling stored assets.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing OG image update, metadata changes, asset rules, and verification requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for various frontend source files describing components, hooks, and styling behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template including canonical URL, updated OG/Twitter metadata, favicons, and app entry point.
frontend/OG_PREVIEW_VERIFICATION.md: Guide for validating social media OG/Twitter previews and troubleshooting OG image deployment issues.
frontend/public/.ic-assets.json5: Asset canister rules explicitly including ogcard-v2.jpg with correct headers and caching settings.
frontend/public/.well-known/ii-alternati: Defines alternative origins for Internet Identity.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining app name, icons, and theme settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component applying dark theme and rendering LandingPage within an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render errors and displays a fallback UI with reload option.
frontend/src/components/InteractiveBackg: Canvas-based interactive mesh that reacts to cursor movement and resizes dynamically.
frontend/src/components/PersonalModeCont: Scroll-driven personal profile layout with section fade-ins, carousel hint animation, and background preloading.
frontend/src/components/ProfessionalMode: Professional profile view with scroll-triggered animations for timelines, experience, tools, and background image preload.
frontend/src/components/ProjectCard.tsx: Clickable project card that opens a detailed overlay with images, YouTube embedding, and carousel scrolling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeSelectorRemeas: Tracks layout changes via resize events and observers, returning a counter to trigger recalculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook demonstrating how to run backend queries using the actor with react-query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, OKLCH theme variables, global styles, and custom animations/interactions for mode selector elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the interactive landing page with mode transitions, preloading images, audio feedback, and animated UI state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata and requirements focused on fixing OG/Twitter card caching via versioned OG images and updated meta tags.
